Authors: Ampuni A., Fitrianto A., Indrajaya R.
Title: E-voting infrastructure system for Indonesia
Source title: International Journal of Innovative Technology and Exploring Engineering
Authors with affiliations: Ampuni, A., Bina Nusantara, Jakarta, Indonesia; Fitrianto, A., Bina Nusantara, Jakarta, Indonesia; Indrajaya, R., Bina Nusantara, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: In digital era, Indonesia as democratic country needs to implement e-voting for presidential and governor election. Some countries have implement e-voting and two of them are more populated than Indonesia. E-voting can make voting process and vote distribution better. In this paper we proposed IT infrastructure for e-voting using load balancing, cryptography, and block chain. Also this proposed model can be discussed further about application and system replication to produce similar data from all servers. © BEIESP.

Authors: Ampuni A., Fonataba S., Fitrianto A., Wang G.
Title: Smart Parking System with Automatic Cashier Machine Utilize the IoT Technology
Source title: Proceeding - 2019 International Conference on ICT for Smart Society: Innovation and Transformation Toward Smart Region, ICISS 2019
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Ampuni, A., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fonataba, S., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fitrianto, A., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Wang, G., Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Management Department, BINUS Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The difficulty of finding car parking spot has become one of main consideration to create this paper and focusing on develop our proposed smart parking system. Other than that, the utilization of internet of things (IoT) technology has become one of great technology that match for complex system with a minimal use of hardware. With the implementation of IoT based on cloud computing, several smart devices, and also smart automatic machine, the concept of smart parking system are expected to be able to provide services for car parking spot searching and car parking spot allocation through the mobile application. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: Automatic Machine; Cloud Computing; Cloud Database; Integrated Application; Internet Of Things; Parking system; Smart Devices
Index Keywords: Cloud computing; Garages (parking); Automatic machines; Cloud database; Integrated applications; Parking systems; Smart devices; Internet of things
